A '''creeper charge banner pattern''' is a [[banner pattern]] used to customize [[banner]]s with a shape of a [[creeper]] face.

== Obtaining ==
=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|Paper
|Creeper Head
|Output=Creeper Charge Banner Pattern
|type=Miscellaneous
}}

== Usage ==
=== Loom ingredient ===
Creeper charge banner patterns are used in [[loom]]s to add customization to [[banner]]s. The pattern must be combined with 1 banner and 1 [[dye]]. Upon usage in the loom, the creeper charge banner pattern is not consumed.

{{Looming
|showdescription=1
|ingredients={{:Banner/recipe|ingredients}}
|{{:Banner/recipe|banner}}
|Matching Dye
|Creeper Charge Banner Pattern
|Creeper Charge
|{{:Banner/recipe|output|Creeper Charge}}
|Blink=Banner
|Olink=Banner
|description=Emblazons a creeper charge (creeper face)
}}
